Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2009 01:19PM PghGrl99 wrote: Its crazy to me how our family is drawn together.  I didn't tell you this but when on the day you posted this I just happen to be searching and found this website.  When I stumbled apon your post It said posted 2 minutes ago.  Its been 16 days since since my Brother posted so I will give you an update on how she is.  Her dx is Stage IV Inflammatory Breast Cancer (also in lungs).  Unfortunatly the Insurance company decided to deny the PET scan so they did a bone and full body scan. She is going to have 8 chemo treatments (She had her port put in and started friday 1 week ago and will continue every 3 weeks), a radical mastectomy, and radiation to follow.  Her first round of chemo was very hard on her.  Could barely get out of bed.  Hardly ate anything the first 3 days.  They have her on several naseau medications but didn't seem to help much.  They have 2 young sons who don't really understand. We know this is going to be a long battle for her thank god she has our family for support!! Any advice would be appreciated! Thanks, Lil Sis
Posts.Title: where to go from here worriedbf PghGrl99
